mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guild_list (guild_name, guild_date, guild_logo, guild_comm, guild_condition_score, guild_condition_play, guild_condition_winrate) VALUES (#{guildName}, #{guildDate}, #{guildLogo}, #{guildComm}, #{conScore}, #{conPlay}, #{conWinRate})
mapper.select: select guild_name AS guildName, guild_date AS guildDate, guild_logo AS guildLogo, guild_comm AS guildComm, guild_l_score AS guildScore, guild_l_play AS guildPlay, guild_l_winrate AS guildWinrate, guild_condition_score AS conScore, guild_condition_play AS conPlay, guild_condition_winrate AS conWinrate from guild_list
